Details: 1 AP to place a rune with 1 tile radius centered on yourself, provoking AoO. Runes activate when stepped on. Runes cost 1 essence each time they do something.
Half rounded up of sigils must belong to the subclass. Proficiency in the skill associated with your subclass.
1 AP to erase rune, must be adjacent.
You do not trigger your own runes if they have the offensive tag.
When you hit with Strike/Grapple/Shove/Treat, may spend 1 essence to apply rune effect that you know.
You have advantage on Focus and Expertise skill checks made to determine how puzzles work.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Downtime activity to create a single permanent rune. Does not cost you essence.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Runes can be 0, 1 or 2 tiles in radius.
Create warp point with downtime activity. Downtime activity or risky skill check to travel between.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
1 AP: replace any of your non-permanent runes with another one you know.
